message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you, and it allows me to make a good profit as well. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,080,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget of $1,200,000.

Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but $1,080,000 simply doesn't work for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,115,000?  This would still give you a significant profit, and it would be a fair price for me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,090,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I really need to stay within my budget of $1,200,000.
